evidence.text: No later than ten (10) days from this date of this Order, the parties shall meet and confer to more narrowly tailor Defendants' remaining discovery requests to Plaintiff's motion for a preliminary injunction.

extracted.value: 10 days: the parties shall meet and confer to more narrowly tailor Defendants' remaining discovery requests to Plaintiff's motion for a preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: No later than fourteen (14) days from the date of this Order, Plaintiff shall respond to them

evidence.text: No later than ten (10) days from the date of this Order, Plaintiff and Defendants shall meet and confer to schedule a mutually‑agreeable date and time for these four depositions.

extracted.value: 10 days: Plaintiff and Defendants shall meet and confer to schedule a mutually‑agreeable date and time for these four depositions.

evidence.text: ordered to meet and confer and submit within 14 days a proposed scheduling order for the bench trial
